caption.p: (A) 3D view of compound 3 inside the binding pocket of SARS-CoV-2 M pro (B) 3D interaction diagram of compound 3 with active site residues of the target protein (C) 2D interaction diagram of compound 3 with active site residues of the target protein (PDB ID- 6Y2F) (Visualized using Maestro visualizer) [70].
